For loop 4, create a circle with center at [0.3335, 0.3335] and radius of 0.0485. For loop 5, create an arc from [0.3642, 0.3853] to [0.6477, 0.3335], a line from [0.6477, 0.3335] to [0.4885, 0.6045], an arc from [0.4885, 0.6045] to [0.3642, 0.3853]. For the extrusion, set the extrude depth towards opposite normal to 0.0722, and the sketch scale to 0.667. The extrusion operation for this part is to cut materials. The length and width of part 1 is 0.75, and the height is 0.1443. The length and width of part 2 is 0.667, and the height is 0.0722. The final shape is a cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, and a slightly tapered middle section.</description>
